summary: An ordinance authorizing an agreement with the State of Washington for partial reimbursement to the City of costs incurred in connection with the installation of certain traffic signals and devices and the inspection of certain water and sewer facilities to be constructed by the State, and authorizing the City Engineer to proceed with such work, all as necessitated by the construction of the Fairview Ave. Connection, Primary State Highway No. 1.
committee: Streets and Sewers and City Utilities
